text: Robin James Olof Stjernberg born 22 February 1991, Hässleholm, Sweden) is a Swedish pop singer. He represented Sweden in the Eurovision Song Contest 2013 in Malmö on 18 May 2013 with the song "You". ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Pop musicians Category:Swedish singers
title: Robin Stjernberg
